hero.title: Nika Amandla Inhlangano Yakho
hero.subtitle: Hlela Tinhloso Tekusimama
hero.description: Kulula, kuphephile, kanye nekuba nesikhona Siza inhlangano yakho kutsi iphumelele esikhatsini sesimanje ngesikhatsi sakha timiso letisima tekusasa.

items.title: Kuhlola Kusimama
items.description: Hlela timiso temvelo, tenhlalakahle, kanye nekuphatsa kutsi wakhe inhlangano lesima kakhulu futhi lenemtfwalo.

items.title: Tihlelo Temsebenti
items.description: Landzela inchubekela yakho ngebhodhi le-Kanban lehlanganyelako, ugucule tinhloso tekwehlola kube imisebenti lenekusetjentiswa kanye nentfutfuko lenukaleka.

items.title: Yakhelwe Inhlangano
items.description: Yenzelwe ngalokukhethekile inhlangano letisebenta ndzawonye eNingizimu Afrika

items.title: Kusekela Tindzimi Letinyenti
items.description: Kuyafumaneka ngeSingisi, siSwati, siPutukezi, siZulu, siJalimane, kanye nesiFulentshi

items.title: Kusebenta Ngaphandle Kwe-inthanethi
items.description: Kusebenta ngekuthembela noma kuncane lokuxhumana ne-inthanethi

userGuide.title: Umhlahlandzela Wemsebenti Wetinhlangano
userGuide.subtitle: Umhlahlandzela ophelele wekusebentisa ipulatifomu yekuhlola kusimama ye-DGRV

quickStart.title: Kucala Lokusheshako
quickStart.step1: 1. 📋 Cala noma uphendvule kuhlola kusuka ku-ikhaya lakho
quickStart.step3: 3. 📎 Namatisa tidokhumenti letisekelako lapho kufanele khona
quickStart.step5: 5. 📊 Sebentisa imiphumela kute udale tihlelo temsebenti kanye nekulandzela inchubekela

gettingStarted.title: Kucala
content: Siyakwemukela kuPulatifomu Yekuhlola Kusimama ye-DGRV! Leli thuluzi lisita inhlangano yakho kutsi ikale kanye nekutfutfukisa timiso tayo tekusimama.
I-ikhaya lakho liniketela kufinyelela kwehlolo, tihlelo temsebenti, kanye nemathuluzi ekulandzela inchubekela.
Uma ungunumphatsi wenhlangano, ungadala tihlolo letintsha kanye nekuphatsa emalunga etikweni. Basebenti benhlangano bangaphendvula tihlolo kanye nekulandzela inchubekela.

roles.title: Kucazwa Tindzima Tabasebenti
content: Umphatsi Wenhlangano (org_admin): Angadala tihlolo letintsha, aphatsa basebenti, kanye nekubuka tidzingo tenhlangano yonkhe.
Umsebenti Wenhlangano (Org_User): Angaphendvula tihlolo letiwele, abuke imiphumela, kanye nekuphatsa tihlelo temsebenti.
Tindzima tobabili tingafinyelela ku-ikhaya, tibuke lokutfunyelwe, kanye nekutfumela tibiko tenhlangano yabo.

assessments.title: Kutfola Tihlolo
content: Tihlolo tihlelwe ngatigaba (e.g., Temvelo, Tenhlalakahle, Nekuphatsa) ngenkibuto kulesigaba ngasinye.
Kunembuto ngamunye, niketa: Imphendvulo Ye-Yebo/Cha, iphesenti lokuphelile (0%, 25%, 50%, 75%, 100%), kanye nencazelo yombhalo leyetayelekile.
Unganamatisa emafayela kusekela timphendvulo takho (max 1MB ngefayela ngalinye). Sebentisa isithonjana sekuphepha kute ungezelele tidokhumenti.
Gcina inchubekela yakho noma nini nge-'Gcina Okusalungiswa'. Phelela yonke imibuto esigabeni ngaphambi kwekuhambela kwesilandzelako.
Uma sekutfunyelwe, tihlolo tiya kunchubo yekubuyeketa ngaphambi kwekugunyatwa kokugcina.

actionPlans.title: Kuphatsa Tihlelo Temsebenti
content: Tihlelo temsebenti tisita kutsi ulandzele imisebenti yekutfutfukisa ngokuya ngetincomo tekwehlola.
Sebentisa ibhodhi ye-Kanban kute uhambise imisebenti ngetigaba: Kutsiwenziwe → Kuyasentwa → Kuphelile → Kugunyatiwe.
Ngezelela imisebenti lemisha, usete tinhlanganiso, kanye nekabela emalunga etikweni kute ulandzele inchubekela ngemphumelelo.
Kubuyeketa njalo kwehlelo lakho lemsebenti kukhombisa kutfutfukisa lokulandzelako.
Tfumela tihlelo temsebenti kute wabelane ngenchubekela nabatfunywa kanye nabaphatsi.

viewingResults.title: Kubuka Imiphumela Yekuhlola
content: Finyelela kulo lonkhe lokutfunyelwe kwakho nge-'Buka Tihlolo' ku-ikhaya.
Landzela simo selokutfunyelwe: Kusalindzile Kubuyeketa → Ngaphasi Kwekubuyeketa → Kugunyatiwe/Kunqatshiwe/Kuceliwe Kubuyeketiwe.
Buka imibono leyetayelekile kanye netincomo kusuka kubabuyeketi kute wati tindzawo tekutfutfukisa.
Cinganisa imiphumela ngetikhatsi tekuhlola letihlukile kute ulandzele inchubekela yenhlangano yakho.
Sebentisa kubukwa kwelokutfunyelwe kute ubuyekete timphendvulo takho kanye netidokhumenti letisekelako.

creatingAssessments.title: Kudala Tihlolo (Baphatsi Kuphela)
content: Baphatsi benhlangano bangacala tindzima letintsha tekuhlola kwenhlangano yabo.
Cofa 'Cala Kuhlola Kusimama' kute udale kuhlola lokusalungiswa.
Yabelana nge-ID yekuhlola nemalunga etikweni kute bangafaka sandla etigabeni tehlukile.
Citsa inchubekela kanye nokuqinisekisa kutsi tonke tigaba tiphelile ngaphambi kwekutfumela kokugcina.
Tfumela tihlolo kuphela uma tonke tigaba letidzingekako tiphelwe ngokuphelele.

userManagement.title: Kuphatsa Emalunga Etikweni (Baphatsi Kuphela)
content: Baphatsi benhlangano bangangezelela kanye nekuphatsa emalunga etikweni nge-'Phatsa Basebenti'.
Memela basebenti labasha nge-imeyili kanye nekabela tindzima letifanele ngokuya ngetimfanelo tabo.
Bela kufinyelela kwesigaba kubasebenti kute bangafaka sandla etindzaweni letikhethekile tekuhlola.
Susa basebenti labangasadzingeki kufinyelela kute ugcine kukhuseleka kanye nekuthembeka kwetidzingo.
Buyeketa njalo timvume tabasebenti kute uqinisekise tindlela tekufinyelela letifanele.

reportsExports.title: Tibiko Nekutfumela
content: Tfumela tibiko tekwehlola ngefomethi ye-PDF kute wabelane nabatfunywa kanye namabhodi.
Sebentisa kutfumela kwe-CSV kwekuhlatiya tidzingo kanye nekulandzela tindlela ngesikhatsi.
Landa tidokhumenti te-Word ngenjongo yetidokhumenti letinemininingwane kanye nekubika.
Kudala tibiko njalo kusita kukhombisa kutfutfukisa lokulandzelako.
Yabelana ngetibiko nemalunga kanye nabatfunywa kute ugcine kusebuka.

bestPractices.title: Tindlela Letinhle Kakhulu Tetinhlangano
content: Bandzakanya emalunga etikweni ahlukahlukene etiHlolo kute utfola tibono leticacile ngetimiso tekusimama.
Niketa timphendvulo letinemininingwane, letithembekile ngetibonelo leticacile kanye netidokhumenti letisekelako.
Sebentisa imiphumela yekuhlola kute udale tihlelo temsebenti letetfutfukisako, letingafinyeleleka.
Tindzima tekuhlola njalo (nyakeni noma kabini enyakeni) tisita kulandzela inchubekela kanye nekugcina umfutho.
Gubha kutfutfukisa kanye nekuyabelana ngetimpumelelo nemalunga enhlangano kanye nemphakatsi.

troubleshooting.title: Tinkinga Letivamile kanye Netindlela Tekulungisa
content: Awukwati kufinyelela etiHlolo: Hlola kumphatsi wenhlangano mayelana nekabelwa kwetindzima kanye nekufinyelela kwesigaba.
Kuhlola akugcinwa: Qinisekisa kutsi uphelela tonke tindzawo letidzingekako (Yebo/Cha, iphesenti, kanye nencazelo yombhalo).
Tinkinga tekulayisha ifayela: Emafayela kufanele abe ngaphasi kwe-1MB. Zama kwehlisa sisayizi sefayela noma usebentise tindlela tefomethi tehlukile.
Awukwati kubona lokutfunyelwe kwetimayini letinye: Baphatsi benhlangano kuphela labangabuka lokutfunyelwe lonkhe.
Tigaba tekuhlola letingekho: Tsintsana nomphatsi wakho kute uqinisekise kabela kwetigaba kwenhlangano yakho.

beforeStarting.title: Ngaphambi Kwekucala:
items: • Bandzakanya emalunga etikweni kusuka etindzaweni tehlukile

needHelp.title: Udzinga Lusito?
needHelp.description: Uma udzinga lusito noma unemibuto mayelana nekusebentisa ipulatifomu:
needHelp.contactAdmin: 💬 Tsintsana nomphatsi wenhlangano yakho ngetinkinga letikhethekile mayelana nendzima

adminGuide.title: Umhlahlandzela Wemphatsi wePulatifomu ye-DGRV
adminGuide.subtitle: Umhlahlandzela ophelele wekuphatsa ipulatifomu yekuhlola kusimama ye-DGRV

quickStart.title: Kucala Lokusheshako
quickStart.step4: 4. 📊 Citsa impilo yesistimu kanye nekusebenta kwayo

overview.title: Sigcawu Sepulatifomu
content: Ipulatifomu Yekuhlola Kusimama ye-DGRV yenzelwe kusita tinhlangano kulo lonkhe eNingizimu Afrika kutsi tikale kanye nekutfutfukisa timiso tato tekusimama.
Njengemphatsi, unekufinyelela ematthuluzini laphangale ekuphatseni tinhlangano, basebenti, lokusetjentiswa kwekuhlola, kanye nekubuyeketa lokutfunyelwe.
Ipulatifomu isekela tindzimi letinyenti kanye nekusebenta ngaphandle kwe-inthanethi kute ibhekane netinkinga tekuvumelaniswa kwe-inthanethi ehlukahlukene esifundzeni.

organizations.title: Kuphatsa Tinhlangano
content: Ngezelela tinhlangano letintsha letisebenta ndzawonye epulatifomini ngetimininingwane tato letisisekelo kanye netinhlelo tetindzawo.
Lungiselela tinhlelo letikhethekile tenhlangano kanye nekuphatsa kufinyelela kwabasebenti kwenhlangano ngasinye.
Citsa inchubekela yenhlangano kanye nekuqinisekisa kuhlukaniswa kwetidzingo ngendlela lefanele phakatsi kwetinhlangano tehlukile.
Faka egcini noma susa tinhlangano letingasasebenti ngesikhatsi ugcina tidzingo tato temlandvo.

users.title: Kuphatsa Basebenti
content: Dala kanye nekuphatsa ema-akhawunti abasebenti kuto tonkhe tinhlangano ngekabela tindzima letifanele.
Bela basebenti etinhlanganweni letikhethekile kanye nekulungiselela timvume tato tekufinyelela.
Citsa inchubekela yabasebenti kanye nekuphatsa simo sekucinisekisa kwe-akhawunti.
Qinisekisa kukhuseleka lokufanele ngokubuyeketa njalo kufinyelela kwabasebenti kanye nekususa ema-akhawunti langasasebenti.

categories.title: Kuphatsa Tigaba Tekuhlola
content: Lungiselela tigaba tekwehlola letivumelekana netindlela letinhle tekusimama kanye netidzingo tasendzaweni.
Seta tisisindo letifanele kulesigaba ngasinye kute uqinisekise kulinganisa kwemamaki ekuhloleni.
Hlela tigaba ngekulandzelana lokubukwa lokufanele kwekwemukeleka kwabasebenti.
Buyeketa njalo kanye nekubuyeketa tigaba ngokuya ngemibono kanye netingucuko tetimiso tekusimama.

questions.title: Kuphatsa Imibuto Yekuhlola
content: Dala imibuto lephangale ngaphakatsi kwesigaba ngasinye kute uhlola kahle timiso tekusimama.
Niketa imibuto ngetindzimi letinyenti kusekela timphakatsi letinhlangano letihlukahlukene.
Seta tisisindo letifanele kanye nekulandzelana lokubukwa kwemibuto ngaphakatsi kwesigaba ngasinye.
Buyeketa njalo kanye nekubuyeketa imibuto ngokuya ngemiphumela yekuhlola kanye nemibono yabatfunywa.

reviews.title: Kubuyeketa Tihlolo
content: Buyeketa tihlolo letitfunyelwe ngokuphelele, ucabangela kokubili emamaki wekwantithati kanye netimphendvulo tekwalitathivu.
Niketa imibono lekhakhi kanye netincomo letikhethekile tekutfutfukisa.
Sebentisa tincomo letijwayelekile kute uqinisekise kuhambelana kwehlolo leminyenti.
Gunyata, nqaba, noma cela kubuyeketiwe ngokuya ngekuphelela kwekuhlola.

recommendations.title: Tincomo Letijwayelekile
content: Dala titemplate tetincomo letingasetjentiswa kabusha ngetimo tekwehlola letivamile kanye netindzawo tekutfutfukisa.
Gcina umtapo wetincomo letisezingeni lelisetulu letingasetjentiswa kuto tonkhe tinhlangano.
Buyeketa njalo tincomo ngokuya ngetindlela letinhle kanye netindlela tekutfutfukisa letiphumelele.
Qinisekisa kutsi tincomo tingasetjentiseka kanye nekutsi tingafinyeleleka etinhlanganweni letinobukhulu obuhlukile kanye netinsita.

systemHealth.title: Impilo Yesistimu kanye Nekusebenta
content: Citsa kusebenta kwepulatifomu, impilo ye-database, kanye nesikhatsi semphendvulo ye-API njalo.
Buyeketa simo sekulayini kwekuvumelanisa kanye nekuqinisekisa kutsi kuvumelaniswa kwetidzingo kusebenta kahle.
Tfumela tibiko tesistimu kanye netincwadzi tekuhlola ngenjongo yekuvumelana kanye nekulungisa tinkinga.
Gcina kugcinwa njalo kanye nekuqinisekisa kukhuseleka kwetidzingo kuto tonkhe tindzima tepulatifomu.

support.title: Kusekela Tinhlangano
content: Niketa umhlahlandzela etinhlanganweni mayelana nekusebentisa ipulatifomu ngemphumelelo ngetinhloso tato tekusimama.
Niketa kufundziswa kanye nemathiriyali yekusekela kute usite tinhlangano titfole inani leliphezulu letihlolo tato.
Citsa tindlela tekuhlola kanye nekukhomba amathuba ekutfutfukisa ipulatifomu.
Yakha budlelwane nabaholi betinhlangano kute wati tidzingo kanye netinsita tabo letikhethekile.

regularReviews.title: Kubuyeketa Njalo:
items: • Buyeketa tihlolo letisalindzile okungenani kanye ngesontfo
• Citsa impilo yesistimu kanye nemetrikhi yekusebenta

qualityAssurance.title: Kuqinisekisa Ikhwalithi:
items: • Qinisekisa timiso tekubuyeketa letihambelana kwehlolo lonkhe
• Gcina kugcinwa kwetidzingo tesistimu kanye netinhlelo njalo

contactInfo.title: Lusito Lwemphatsi
contactInfo.description: Ngelusito lwetekhnikhali noma imibuto yekuphatsa ipulatifomu:

reviewAssessments.title: Buyeketa Tihlolo
reviewAssessments.subtitle: Buyeketa kanye nekugunyata tihlolo letitfunyelwe
reviewAssessments.reviewDescription: Buyeketa kanye nekuniketa tincomo ngekuhlola lokusimama
reviewAssessments.question: umbuto
reviewAssessments.reviewSavedLocally: Kubuyeketa kugcinwe endzaweni. Kutawuvumelaniswa uma kuse-inthanethi.
